deity.name: Kord
deity.text: Kord is the storm god and the lord of battle. He revels in strength, battlefield prowess, and thunder. Fighters and athletes revere him. He is a mercurial god, unbridled and wild, who summons storms over land and sea; those who hope for better weather appease him with prayers and spirited toasts. He gives few commands:
► Be strong, but do not use your strength for wanton destruction.
► Be brave and scorn cowardice in any form.
► Prove your might in battle to win glory and renown.

power.title: Kord's Favor
power.fluff: Kord favors a strong hit in combat with healing

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You or an ally within 5 squares of you scores a critical hit with a melee attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target can spend a healing surge to regain hit point equal to his or her recovery value.
